It grows up to 3 metres in height and is known for its sweetly scented pink flowers that bloom in late spring. With its leathery leaves and clusters of reddish-purple bell-shaped flowers, the Dahurian Rhododendron is a dramatic addition to any garden or landscape. They can thrive in cold climates, prefer moist and well-draining soils, and need protection from wind or frost damage. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":6610,"attracts":[],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"rhododendron","description":"Rhododendron 'English Roseum' is a deciduous shrub with an abundance of pink, bell-shaped blooms that will be a valuable addition to any garden. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":6673,"attracts":["Hummingbirds"," Butterflies"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"evergreen azalea","description":"Evergreen azalea (Rhododendron 'Megan') is a low-growing deciduous shrub with an upright form. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":6724,"attracts":["Butterflies"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"deciduous azalea","description":"Deciduous azalea (Rhododendron 'Snow White') is an evergreen shrub that produces abundant clusters of single white armchair-shaped blooms in the spring. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":6735,"attracts":["Hummingbirds"," Butterflies"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"rhododendron","description":"Rhododendron 'Tyler Morris' SOUTHGATE RADIANCE is an evergreen shrub with glossy, green foliage and large clusters of lightly fragrant, small, white blooms with pink stripes. Its blooms typically begin in spring and last until summer. It matures to a height of 4-5 feet with a 4-5 feet spread and prefers part-shade in well-drained, alkaline soil. {"type":"json_schema","json_schema":{"id":6772,"attracts":["Birds"],"care_level":"Medium","common_name":"gooseberry","description":"Gooseberry (Ribes uva-crispa 'Captivator') is a deciduous shrub that is native to Europe. It can grow up to 2 feet in height and spread 4 feet wide. This species of Ribes produces tart, yellowish green fruits that ripen in early summer.
